cta.title: Ready to Transform Your Team?
cta.description: Whether you need on-site workshops, virtual training, or custom curriculum development, we'll work with you to design a program that fits your team's needs and schedule.

about.title: 15+ Years of Partnership & Excellence
about.paragraph1: For over 15 years, we've been dedicated to building meaningful solutions that truly serve our customers. From day one, we believed that great work starts with a shared vision—understanding our clients' goals as if they were our own.
about.paragraph2: We don't see ourselves as just a service provider, but as a co-operator and long-term partner. We work side by side with our customers, listening carefully, adapting quickly, and collaborating openly to achieve real, measurable results.
about.paragraph3: To us, our customers' success is our success. Every project we take on is driven by that belief, pushing us to deliver work that creates lasting value—not just short-term wins.
about.paragraph4: As the world evolves, so do we. We are constantly improving ourselves, refining our skills, and raising our standards to become better than we were yesterday. This commitment to growth allows us to stay relevant, innovative, and reliable for the people who trust us.
about.motto: Together, we grow. Together, we succeed.

discovery.title: Discovery Workshop
discovery.description: Week 1: Two-day intensive session to understand your business goals, technical requirements, and success metrics.

planning.title: Strategic Planning
planning.description: Week 2-3: Develop comprehensive roadmap with milestones, deliverables, and resource allocation.

execution.title: Agile Execution
execution.description: Week 4+: Sprint-based development with continuous feedback and iterative improvements.

delivery.title: Delivery & Support
delivery.description: Final week: Deployment, training, and 90-day support period to ensure smooth transition.

items.quote: Gotik supported us in modernizing our software to a highly flexible system. We benefited enormously from the know-how of the various Gotik experts.
items.author: Rolf Traber

items.quote: We brought in Gotik so that we can implement future innovations faster in our software. The collaboration with Gotik was first-class – technically and personally.
items.author: Christian Königsdorfer

items.quote: The microservices architecture that Gotik designed for us has transformed our ability to scale. We can now deploy updates independently and respond to market changes faster than ever before.
items.author: Michael S.

meta.title: Software Engineering | Gotik Consulting
meta.description: We turn your ideas into excellent software solutions. Benefit from our expertise and the latest methodological insights.

hero.title: Transform Your Ideas into
hero.description: We turn your ideas into excellent software solutions. Benefit from our expertise and the latest methodological insights.

benefits.title: Benefits of Professional Software Engineering
benefits.description: With over 25 years of experience in software development, we have a deep understanding of the challenges and needs of companies of all sizes and industries.

customSoftware.title: Excellent Custom Software
customSoftware.description: Our tailored software solutions are characterized by the highest quality down to the smallest detail. We implement your project not only skillfully technically, but also incorporate the latest methodological insights to develop excellent custom software.

solutionPortfolio.title: Comprehensive Solution Portfolio
solutionPortfolio.description: Our offering covers the entire solution spectrum, from components and interfaces to comprehensive platforms and entire software suites. Whether simple or highly complex requirements, we develop tailored solutions for Cloud, Web, Mobile, Desktop, and Embedded systems.

technologyCompetence.title: Versatile Technology Competence
technologyCompetence.description: We are familiar with a wide range of technologies, methods, and tools. This broad spectrum of expertise allows us to select the best options for your specific project.

crossIndustry.title: Cross-Industry Know-how
crossIndustry.description: Our team consists of proven specialists who are familiar with different domains and technologies. This cross-industry expertise enables us to respond flexibly and effectively to the individual requirements and challenges of your project.

services.title: Our Software Engineering Services
services.description: From the initial idea to successful implementation – we accompany you throughout the entire software development lifecycle.

endToEnd.title: End-to-End Software Development
endToEnd.description: Our experts support you from the initial idea to successful introduction – for simple as well as highly complex projects. Our engineering portfolio includes all types of software – from components and interfaces to extensive platforms and entire software suites. We turn your ideas into powerful applications for Cloud, Web, Mobile, Desktop, and Embedded systems.

techConsulting.title: Technology Consulting
techConsulting.description: Our technology experts advise you on selecting and deploying the best technologies for your project. We are always at the cutting edge and offer you innovative and future-proof solutions.

projectManagement.title: Project Management
projectManagement.description: Our experienced project managers ensure smooth execution of your software projects. They master both classical and agile methods and ensure your project is completed on time and within budget.

managedTeams.title: Managed Teams
managedTeams.description: With our managed teams, we offer you an effective solution to relieve your organization and flexibly strengthen it with the required expertise and manpower at short notice. Together with you, we put together a dedicated team that is precisely tailored to your individual requirements in terms of size and skill set.

qualityMap.title: Software Development Quality Map
qualityMap.description: Good software quality is close to every development team's heart. But what to do when the software hasn't reached the desired quality yet? The Software Development Quality Map shows the solution path: It takes teams on a discovery journey through 80 different topics.
qualityMap.caption: 80 Topics for Excellence
qualityMap.subcaption: Your path to better software quality

items.quote: Gotik was able to quickly implement our requirements into high-quality software. We are thrilled with the good collaboration and the high quality of the software.
items.author: Daniel Mayer

items.quote: Gotik is the ideal software partner for us: great expertise, strong in analysis, and efficient in implementation.
items.author: Istvan Szalai

items.question: What is custom software?
items.answer: Custom software is a tailored software solution developed specifically according to the requirements and needs of your company or project. Our experience, know-how, and quality standards ensure that your individual software solution is perfect down to the smallest detail.

items.question: What are the advantages of custom software over standard software?
items.answer: Custom software offers flexibility, scalability, and perfect alignment with your business processes. While standard software may require compromises, custom solutions are designed exactly for your needs. This leads to higher efficiency, better user experience, and competitive advantages.

items.question: Can Gotik also further develop or modernize existing software?
items.answer: Yes, we not only offer the development of new software solutions but can also further develop or modernize your existing software. Use our expertise to modernize your software so that it can flexibly adapt to changing business requirements.

hero.title: Harness the Potential of
hero.description: Software modernization promises enormous potential: from boosting performance, improving security and quality, to developing new business ideas.

benefits.title: Your Benefits through Software Modernization
benefits.description: Make your software fit for the future. New methods open the door to significantly streamline business processes and develop new services.

potential.title: Enormous Potential
potential.description: Boost your software's performance, security, and quality, and develop new business ideas. Migrate legacy systems to the cloud, maintain and further develop existing applications, and integrate mobile apps.

efficient.title: Efficient Business Processes
efficient.description: Use modern methods to optimize your business processes and create new services that drive efficiency and innovation.

adaptive.title: Adaptive Software
adaptive.description: Benefit from our expertise to modernize your software so it can flexibly adapt to changing business and user requirements.

futureProof.title: Future-Proof Solutions
futureProof.description: Prepare for the future and avoid costly patchwork through targeted modernization or a complete redevelopment of your software.

quality.title: Quality and Stability
quality.description: Resolve existing quality and stability issues and bring user guidance up to date with modern UX standards.

hero.title: Transform Your Business with

benefits.title: Why Choose Our Salesforce Services?

meta.title: Odoo ERP Solutions | Gotik Consulting
meta.description: Transform your business operations with Odoo ERP. Gotik is a proud Odoo Partner offering implementation, customization, and support services.

hero.title: Streamline Your Business with
hero.description: Gotik is a proud Odoo Partner. We help you transform your operations with a fully integrated, modular ERP platform designed for modern growth.

benefits.title: The Odoo Advantage
benefits.description: Odoo's unique modular approach allows businesses to start with what they need and scale seamlessly as they grow.

integration.title: All-in-One Integration
integration.description: Replace multiple disconnected legacy systems with a single integrated database. Finance, HR, Sales, and Inventory all work together in perfect harmony.

modularity.title: Infinite Modularity
modularity.description: With over 30,000 apps available, Odoo can be tailored to any industry or business size. Only pay for the features you actually use.

scalability.title: Cost-Effective Scalability
scalability.description: Enjoy lower total cost of ownership compared to traditional ERPs. Odoo's open-source core and flexible pricing make it accessible for both SMEs and enterprises.

interface.title: User-Friendly Interface
interface.description: Odoo features a modern, intuitive interface that simplifies complex business processes, leading to higher employee adoption and fewer errors.

services.title: Our Odoo Services
services.description: As your Odoo Partner, we provide end-to-end services to ensure your ERP implementation is a success.
